name: Out of CTRL (MtWhateverest)
description:
The ctrl key is missing! Can you find it and put it back in it's place on the keyboard?

Hint: "The ctrl key has several possible spawn locations and they are all easily accessible".

>> Recommended to play on the downloadable version as it seems to run better and the mouse sensitivity is better <<

How to play: 

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Left mouse button to pick up and hold objects

Right mouse button to throw objects

Mouse scroll wheel to move objects closer or further away

Esc to pause

Tab to quickly restart

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Engine: Unity

3D Models: Blender

Some sound effects: Bosca Ceoil

Music from Epidemic Sounds
